front.title: Extending the Number of IS-IS LSP Fragments Beyond the 256 Limit

abstract.t: This document describes a mechanism to allow a system to originate more than 256 LSP fragments, a limit set by the original Intermediate System to Intermediate System (IS-IS) Routing protocol, as described in ISO 10589. This mechanism can be used in IP-only, OSI-only, and dual routers.
